property.name: BEFORE_PLACE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Event is placed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_PLACE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is placed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_LINKS_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after one or more links in the Event have been added, deleted, or modified. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_NEW
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is created. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DELETE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Event is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_DELETE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is deleted. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_UPDATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Event is updated. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_UPDATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is updated. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_EMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Event is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_EMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is embedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_UNEMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Event is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_UNEMBED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is unembedded. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_MOVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Event is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_MOVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is relocated from one object to another. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: ON_INVOKE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when the Event is invoked. This event does not bubble. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_INVOKE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the Event is invoked. This event does not bubble. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_INVOKE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the Event is invoked. This event does not bubble. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DISPLAY
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the Event is displayed. This event does not bubble. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_QUIT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the Event is quit. Allows the quit to be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_QUIT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when the Event is quitting. Since the quit has been committed, it can not be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_CONTEXT_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the active context changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after an attribute on the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the Event becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the Event becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_OPEN
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Event is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Event is closed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when a Event is closing. Since the close has been committed, it can no longer be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: eventType
property.shortdesc: The name of the event.

property.name: target
property.shortdesc: The target of the event.

property.name: currentTarget
property.shortdesc: The current propagation target of the event.

property.name: eventPhase
property.shortdesc: The current propagation phase of the event.

property.name: bubbles
property.shortdesc: If true, the event supports the bubbling phase of propagation.

property.name: cancelable
property.shortdesc: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target can be canceled.

property.name: timeStamp
property.shortdesc: The time the event was initialized.

property.name: propagationStopped
property.shortdesc: If true, propagation of the event beyond the current target has been stopped.

property.name: defaultPrevented
property.shortdesc: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target has been canceled.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Event.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Event within its containing object.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: stopPropagation
method.shortdesc: Stops propagation of the event beyond the current target.

method.name: preventDefault
method.shortdesc: Cancels the default behavior of the event on its target.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Event.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
